property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature, if you have 2 shields or less, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win until the start of your next turn. ■ Revolution 0—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, untap it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, your opponent chooses one of their cards in the battle zone, mana zone and hand and puts them on the bottom of their deck. Then draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Forbidden Star Evolution: When you put this creature, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-evolution RexStars, then put it under this creature and shuffle your deck. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) ■ When you put another RexStars, you may put the top card of your deck face up under this creature. ■ If this creature doesn't contain 6 or more cards, it can't attack or be chosen by your opponent. ■ When this creature consists of 6 cards, each of your opponent's creatures gets -99999 power until the end of the turn. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 5 or more creatures that have different costs, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Variety Breaker (This creature breaks the same number of shields as your creatures that have different costs.) ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn it is put. ■ While this creature is attacking, your opponent can't summon a creature that costs the same as one of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WORLD BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, your opponent puts their hand into their mana zone. ■ You can't be attacked by creatures that have less power than this creature. {FUSHIGIVERSE} Darkness/Nature 14 (You may put one of your creatures into your mana zone tapped to summon this creature from your graveyard for a cost equal to Darkness/Nature 14 minus that creature's cost. Reveal one, put it into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card you revealed in this way is multicolored, you may choose a creature and return it to it's owner's hand.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw 3 cards, then put a card in your hand into your hyperspatial zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. ■ When you put this creature, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. You may return an Abyss card from among them into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may take a creature that has "Bolshack" in its name from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Your Dragons may each cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 1 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may put an evolution creature from it into your mana zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a creature that has "Bolmeteus" in its name, you may choose both: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less and destroy it: ► Tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's cards that costs 4 or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 2 of them into your mana zone tapped, then put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {KIRIFUDASH} {C0} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Colorless 0 to summon this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack unless you have a fire and a nature card in your mana zone.

card.name: Nightmare Kiriko, Nightmare of the Divine Song

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) ■ Evolution: Put one one of your water creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, shuffle all your non-evolution creatures, your hand and your graveyard into your deck. Then look at the top 6 cards of your deck. Put up to 3 creatures from among them and put the rest into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, if a player has no shields and you don't have a 'Ballom Nightmare, Lord of Nightmares', you may reveal this creature from your hand and put the card on the bottom of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a non-evolution Demon Command, put it, then put this on top of it. ■ Evolution: Put one of your Demon Command creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put all non-Demon Command creatures into their owner's hyperspatial zone. ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures are put tapped.

For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random. Then draw a card. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and shieldify it. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 5 or more creatures that have different costs, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Variety Breaker (This creature breaks the same number of shields as your creatures that have different costs.) ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn it is put. ■ While this creature is attacking, your opponent can't summon a creature that costs the same as one of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put one one of your Angel Command creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ESCAPE (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.) ■ While this creature is tapped, you can't lose the game.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Dragon Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more Dragon creatures in your mana zone, this creature costs 5 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ You can't equip 2 or more weapons that have the same name to this creature. ■ When you put this creature, put any number of fire draghearts that have total cost 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (If they are weapons, equip them to this creature.) ■ Each turn, whenever this creature taps for the first time, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Water or Fire dragon that costs 5 or more {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever you put a multicolored creature, you may draw a card. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. Then put up to 2 non-evolution multicolored creatures from your hand that have total cost the same as or less than the chosen creature's cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and destroy it. ■ Each turn, when one of your creatures attacks for the first time, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone, return up to 2 cards from your mana zone to your hand, then untap all Jokers in your mana zone. ■ Once per turn, after one of your creature's attacks, if that creature broke a shield during that attack, you may summon a creature from your hand. (Pay the cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more Dragons in your mana zone, this creature costs 3 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Once per turn, when you put a dragon, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If its a Dragon, put it. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
